content.eamr: ( ing-0 "3 tablespoons crushed black peppercorns" )
( ing-1 "2 (8 ounce) beef top sirloin steaks" )
( ing-2 "1 tablespoon lemon pepper" )
( ing-3 "1 teaspoon salt" )
( ing-4 "5 tablespoons butter" )
( ing-5 "2 cloves garlic, minced" )
( ing-6 "1/2 cup red wine" )
( ing-7 "3 tablespoons brandy" )
( ing-8 "1/4 cup chopped green onions" )
( ing-9 "1 shallot, chopped" )
( ing-10 "1/2 cup heavy cream" )
( ing-11 "1 teaspoon white sugar (optional)" )

content.text: 0) Press crushed peppercorns into both sides of each steak.
1) Sprinkle with lemon pepper, and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Sprinkle"@3:11 / AC
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "lemon pepper"@17:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salt"@35:39 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Melt"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "medium-high heat"@39:55 / TEMPERATURE )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "butter"@8:14 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a large skillet"@18:33 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Stir in garlic and wine, and cook for 1 minute.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "garlic"@11:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "wine"@22:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "cook"@32:36 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "1 minute"@41:49 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Arrange steaks in pan, and cook for 5 to 10 minutes per side, or until desired doneness.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Arrange"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "steaks"@11:17 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-4-0 "pan"@21:24 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "cook"@30:34 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "5 to 10 minutes per side"@39:63 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until desired doneness"@68:90 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Pour brandy onto steaks, and carefully light with a match.
8) Sprinkle green onion and shallot around the steaks, and circle the steaks with cream.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Sprinkle"@3:11 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "green onion"@12:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "shallot"@28:35 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "the steaks"@43:53 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-8-1 "circle"@59:65 / AC
		:gol ( "the steaks"@66:76 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "cream"@82:87 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Stir sugar into sauce, and then spoon over meat.
